name: Block Swap (Aether95)
description:
My first game jam game made for the LM0B Beginner Jam #20! The theme was dimensions, so I thought of a player that could swap dimensions to get through the levels!

I didn't get as much time as I would have liked to to work on this over the week, so it's fairly simplistic, but still fun I think.

The game should work with controllers as well, or at least it works with my Xbox One controller:

Left stick move

Jump with A

Dash with X

Swap dimensions with LB

At the end screen you can reset the game with Select.

The fonts, sounds, and music are from the amazing NinjaAdventure pack by pixel-boy.
Made with the Godot Engine v3.2.3
